column4: hello ... is it possible to tell "make-kpkg" to use gcc 4.0 ?
i'm willing to guess make-kpkg has nothing to do with gcc... but i may be wrong, either way, CC=gcc-4.0 and export CC prior to make-kpkg should do the trick

because 4.0 is right there ... and Debian.src.changelog has mentioned some changes for compiling under gcc4.0
